nodes.text: The Leviathan Power Armor was a form of protective body powersuit that was developed by the Mon Calamari people.

This protective armor was developed for the unique physiology of the Mon Calamari race but was capable of being modified for use by other Humanoid races. It was originally developed by Ylan Ghalir and was similar to the starships produced by Dac in that each suit was unique and a work of art.

It was designed for the Rebel Alliance to harass Imperial aquatic installations. This armor came up with a wide range of aquatic combat oriented weapons which included a Flechette rifle and Mini-Torpedo Launcher.
